posts.post_content:
1911 Obak Kane, Vernon 

This card was originally in an SGC 30 holder, which i suspected was due to being in an album at one time and I thought too harshly graded. So I cracked it and sent it to PSA, which it came back AUT. I can tell the top and right edges are rolled over and 100% original. It's possible the left edge is trimmed as the card is maybe 1/32" short side to side but not overly. SO who is right? Hard to say.

I am offering it is as is, in other words possibly trimmed, sold as is. 

Other than that it is a blazer of a card.

$65 delivered      Check, MO or PP F/F
